Dialogue: Barry: Hey kid I'm Barry, Mr. Flake's right hand man, and this is-
Jerry: I'm Jerry, left hand man.
Jerry: We're lookin' for a guy named Eli.
Barry: He's known for his bright blue eyes-
Jerry: Hard to miss. He's the only person in the town with those eyes.
Barry: You haven't seen this guy? At all? Alright then!
Barry: What's that?
Jerry: Shit, that's Eli's shoe!
Barry: Take that to Mr. Flake. He'll give you a reward for that.
Barry: What are you still doing here! Take that shoe to Mr. Flake!
Barry: We are employees of an honest business man named Mr. Flake.
Jerry: Who's Mr. Flake? Wow, you never heard of him before?
Jerry: Look at this kid Barry, hahaha. You really don't know Mr. Flake?
Barry: He's the richest person in the town!
Barry: Anyways, that's not important right now. Have you seen the man with the blue eyes?
Jerry: Our boss wants him.
Barry: If you are hiding him or not telling us his whereabouts, you'll be sorry.
Jerry: You've been warned. If you do see him, come find us and we'll reward you handsomely.
Jerry: Was the boss happy? You're making us look bad, kid. We've been searching for days now.
Barry: Getting schooled by a kid . . . you keep this up and we'll have a problem.
Barry: Since you might not know, Mr. Flake owns a store on the left side of town.
Jerry: If you need something, he'll have it.
Barry: You lost kid?
